text: Idol 2016 is the twelfth season of the Swedish Idol series. This is the first year with a new jury consisting of Fredrik Kempe, Nikki Amini and Quincy Delight Jones III. Presenter of the show is as previous Pär Lernström. The show is broadcast on TV4. ==Elimination chart == {|class="wikitable" align="center" |colspan="2" align="right"|Stage: | align="Center" bgcolor="#cccccc" colspan="6" |Semi Finals |colspan="11"
